Class Exam

java.lang.Object
com.panotify.model.Exam
public class Exam extends Object
Represents an exam in the PaNotify system. Contains exam details, questions, scoring information, and timing constraints. Manages the state of an exam including its publication status and deadlines.

    • Exam

      public Exam()
      Default constructor for Exam class. Initializes an empty question list, sets creation time, and defaults to unpublished status.

      Parameters:
      title - The title of the exam
      courseId - The ID of the course this exam belongs to
      instructorId - The ID of the instructor who created this exam
